question: In what year did Gregor Mendel die?

snippets.text: The life and personality of Johann Gregor Mendel (1822-1884)
Gregor Mendel, OSA (1822-1884), founder of scientific genetics.
The life and personality of Johann Gregor Mendel (1822-1884), the founder of scientific genetics, are reviewed against the contemporary background of his times.
